entry.title: Assam Full Leaf Pyramid - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Black Tea
Price: 17.50

A strong & matured tea from the lush estates of Assam containing rare golden-tipped leaves. This tea is characterized by a pronounced malty flavor & dark red Colour, ideal for tea lovers whose weakness is strength.
Each Teabag contains 2gms tea.

A rare & enchanting selection of the finest tea leaves from the foothill of the Himalayas. This premium Darjeeling is characterized by a sparkling amber color, flowery aroma and a smooth flavor with distinct fruity notes. Much sought after by connoisseurs worldwide.
Each Pyramid Teabag Contains 2 grams of Tea.

Fine Green tea flavoured with mint.

Bright Colouring Darjeeling summer tea with a pleasant aroma and taste.

entry.title: Aroma Black & Green Tea Assortment Individual Envelope - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type:
Price: 24.99

Golden Tips Tea was established with a mission to epitomise the art of drinking gourmet teas and an endeavour to make available the luxury of pure & unblended single-origin Indian teas to connoisseurs across the globe. With a commitment to serve only the finest & freshest picks, each tea is selected with precision and packed at source within days of their harvest. Our expert team of tasters & master blenders navigate & assess each tea tasting several hundred cups every week to select those from the prime tea growing season which are destined to bear the Golden Tips stamp. A brand with passion, ethics and a heritage of over 80 years.
 
Mint Green Tea:- Fine Green tea flavoured with mint. 
 
Darjeeling Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea flavoured with citrusy lemon.
 
Jasmine Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea with a mellowed taste.
 
Darjeeling Black Tea:- Bright Colouring Darjeeling summer tea with a pleasant aroma and taste.
 
English Breakfast Tea:- Initially known as Breakfast Tea, English Breakfast.
 
Earl Grey Black Tea:- Bright Colouring black orthodox tea flavoured with the oil of bergamot.

Each Tea contains 5 Teabags

entry.title: Oolong Tea Full Leaf Pyramid - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Oolong Tea
Price: 18.00

An extraordinary Oolong Tea from Darjeeling, a go-between black and green tea having properties of both. Tenderly grown and expertly processed in select estates, Darjeeling Oolong Teas are made from finely plucked leaves, usually two leaves and a bud. This beautiful leaf tea type is semi-oxidized and abundant in anti-oxidants with several health benefits.
Each Teabag contains 2gms tea.

A refreshing blend of high grow full leaf black tea combined with natural extracts of Chocolate. This bright Colouring tea makes for a robust and flavoury cup.

entry.title: Pure Chamomile Herbal Infusion- Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Herbal Tea
Price: 3.09

Chamomile is herb that people have used for centuries. It is noted for its naturally calming energy and its ability to relax both body and mind. It is known to be a beverage which helps calm an upset stomach or assists in stress-busting and inducing sleep. The fruit-like flavour, similar to apple, makes the drink a delicacy. Can also be had with a dash of honey.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.

Price: 10.99

Earl Grey, the most popular tea blend in the world is named after the British Prime Minister, the 2nd Earl Grey. Our Earl Grey Tea is a classic blend of premium black tea from India and the natural oil of bergamot, a pear-shaped sour orange originally found in southern Italy.
Each Teabag contains 2gms tea.

entry.title: Masala Chai Envelope - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Black Tea
Price: 10.99 - 22.80 (2 variants)

An age-old classic, Masala Chai, literally meaning 'Spiced Teas' is one of the most popular tea blends in the world, originating from India. This unique & ancient preparation contains a strong Assam black tea blended with a variety of fresh aromatic spices.
Ingredients:
Black Tea, Green Cardamom, Dry Ginger, Black Pepper, Long Pepper, Cloves, Bay Leaves, Cinnamon.
Packed in individually enveloped sachets to preserve freshness and flavor. Steep 3-5 Minutes
Can be served with or without milk
Health Benefits:
Prevent Cold and Nasal Congestion, Antioxidant-rich helps prevent cell damage, Boost Energy, and Immunity. Each Teabag Contains 2gms Tea.

Initially known as Breakfast Tea, English Breakfast, is the most popular tea blend in the world. Popularized by the Queen Victoria of England, this robust tea is traditionally paired with a hearty breakfast and goes perfectly with milk and sugar.
Each Teabag contains 2gms tea.
